name: Arcana Force 0 - The Fool
text: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. This card cannot be changed to Defense Position, except with a card effect. When this card is summoned, toss a coin: ● Heads: Negate the effects of your Spells, Traps, and Effect Monsters' effects that target this card, and destroy them. ● Tails: Negate the effects of your opponent's Spells, Traps, and Effect Monsters' effects that target this card, and destroy them.
